N

neuralnet - package neuralnet
 
NeuralNetwork - Class in neuralnet
this class create fully connected neural network.
NeuralNetwork(int[]) - Constructor for class neuralnet.NeuralNetwork
create a fully connected neural network with multiple hidden layer of neurons.
the standard activation function are the sigmoid function.
NeuralNetwork(int, int[], int) - Constructor for class neuralnet.NeuralNetwork
create a fully connected neural network with multiple hidden layer of neurons.
the standard activation function are the sigmoid function.
NeuronNetwork - Class in neuralnet
this class create standard neural network, less efficient that the NeuralNetwork class but allow more complex structure this is inspired by the Neat AI algorithm
NeuronNetwork() - Constructor for class neuralnet.NeuronNetwork
build an empty neural Network
NeuronNetwork(int[]) - Constructor for class neuralnet.NeuronNetwork
Create a New Neuron network based on a fully connected network Structure.
NeuronNetwork(int[], float) - Constructor for class neuralnet.NeuronNetwork
Create a New Neuron network based on a fully connected network Structure.
NeuronNetwork(int, int[], int) - Constructor for class neuralnet.NeuronNetwork
Create a New Neuron network based on a fully connected network Structure.
NeuronNetwork(int, int[], int, float) - Constructor for class neuralnet.NeuronNetwork
Create a New Neuron network based on a fully connected network Structure.
nextGen() - Method in class neuralnet.GeneticAlgorithm
compute the next generation of neuralNetwork
normalizeNetwork() - Method in class neuralnet.NeuronNetwork
delete useless neuron and collapse the network in it minimal structure (by taking the minimum amount of layer) useful to compare two similar network that were build differently.
